name: Infinity
interpretation:
Encountering the infinity in dreams or visions may signal a call to explore eternal cycles and boundless continuity. Jung might interpret the infinity as a symbol of individuation and wholeness, while Hillman could see it as an invitation to engage with the sacred dimensions of psyche. Mythologically, the infinity appears across cultures as a symbol of eternal, endless. Esoteric traditions might frame it as a key to understanding eternal cycles and boundless continuity. If the infinity appears in your experience, consider what aspects of eternal cycles and boundless continuity are seeking attention in your life.

— Inspired by Jung, Hillman, Campbell, Grof, ARAS, and archetypal wisdom traditions.
